job.command:
set LOCATION=/star/institutions/anl/sgliske/data/EEmcTrees/2006.Feb21
echo User code starting at date
# sleep a random number of seconds, so that multiple instances do not all start at once set SEC=`echo 'r=$RANDOM; let "r %= 60"; echo $r' | zsh` echo sleeping $SEC sec sleep ${SEC}s
foreach FILE1 ( ${LOCATION}/*EEmcTree_Part1.*root )
foreach ALGO ( TSIU ) set FILE2=${FILE1:t:s/Part1.trig-h.root/Part2.trig-h/}.${ALGO}.root set FILE3=${FILE1:t:s/Part1.trig-h.root/Part3.trig-h/}.${ALGO}.root
if ( ! -e ${FILE1:h}/$FILE2 ) then echo $FILE1 $FILE2 $FILE3 echo In progress $JOBID >>! ${FILE1:h}/$FILE2 date >> ${FILE1:h}/$FILE2
# Make Part 2 and 3 for this ALGO echo root4star -b -q macros/makeEEmcTreePart2and3_${ALGO}.C\(\"${FILE1}\",\"${FILE2}\",\"${FILE3}\"\) time root4star -b -q macros/makeEEmcTreePart2and3_${ALGO}.C\(\"${FILE1}\",\"${FILE2}\",\"${FILE3}\"\)
echo $FILE2 $FILE3 ${FILE1:h} cp $FILE2 $FILE3 ${FILE1:h} endif end end
echo All done at date
ls -lh
